  • Uses of ActionList in edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items

    Methods in edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items that return ActionList
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ActionList
    Item.allowableActions(Actor owner, GameMap map)
    List of allowable actions that the item can perform to its owner or to the current map while being carried by an actor Example #1: a healing item can have a special skill that can increase the current actor's hitpoints.
    ActionList
    Item.allowableActions(Actor otherActor, Location location)
    List of allowable actions that the item allows its owner do to other actor.
    ActionList
    Item.allowableActions(Location location)
    List of allowable actions that can be performed on the item when it is on the ground Example #1: a trap can return an action to disarm the trap.
